about_the_game:
Fall into a world of redemption and battle where the very essence of Hell meets the power of the human spirit. Hell Scream places you in the role of one of the fallen warriors, condemned to the fiery depths and striving for salvation. Find yourself battling amidst the roaring crowd in an ever-shifting Colosseum. With an arsenal of firearms at your fingertips and supernatural abilities within you, fight against an onslaught of demons, each encounter pushing you closer to redemption... or damnation.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic FPS Gameplay: Blend firearms with powerful supernatural abilities.
  • Multiple characters: There are many sinners, but not all have a chance to survive, and beat the Colosseum. Choose the one that fits your playstyle.
  • Swarms of various demons: Adapt to waves of multitude of enemies each requiring their own tactic to beat.
  • Rogue-lite Progression: Level-up after killing demons, and be granted an upgrade from Heaven that watches you with growing interest.
  • Evolving Arena: Experience the Colosseum's transformative nature. Walls will rise from the ground, and crumble unpredictably wave after wave.
  • Immersive Aesthetics: Dive into a highly detailed, AAA-quality, Unreal Engine 5 environment, crafted to mirror the desolation and beauty of Hell.
  • Riveting Soundtrack: Be captivated by an orchestral score punctuated with haunting religious choirs.

Experience the unique fusion of FPS, rogue-lite, and magic in a world where salvation is but a battle away.

content_descriptors.notes: The player is a sinner in Hell who kills demons with various firearms, and magical abilities. These demon deaths may contain gore.

short_description: Hell Scream is a fast-paced FPS with rogue-lite elements set in a transforming Colosseum of Hell. You have multiple sinners each from a different timeline and unique abilities. Wield firearms and harness ancient supernatural as you strive for redemption against relentless demon hordes.
